exec: pm.expect(res.error).to.contain("Password must be at least 6 characters");

request.description:
## Parameters | Parameter | Required | Value | Notes | ------ | -------- | ----- |------ | | username | true | STRING | Must be in the format of "firstName.lastName" with minimum number of 6 characters | | email | true | STRING | Must be in the format of email | | password | false | STRING | if not provided, the default password will be taken from username like the following example:-
username : John.Smith
password: js.1234 ###### - User is disabled by default after registration

request.description:
## Parameters


| Parameter   | Required | Value | Notes
| ------      | -------- | ----- |------ |
| username | true     | STRING   | Either username or email |
| email| true     | STRING   | Either username or email |
| password | true | STRING  | 

Permissions will be set after each login request

response.name: LOGIN_MissingParameter
Get Me_Invalid
Logout_Valid

header.value: token=none; Path=/; Expires=Sat, 11 Jun 2022 00:05:29 GMT; HttpOnly

request.description:
Username Must be in the format of "firstName.lastName" with minimum number of 6 characters

Password is optional .. if not provided, the default password will be taken from username like the following example: 

username : John.Smith 

password: js.1234

role is optional - default value = user

permissions is not required - default value = []

Update all user data 
username
email
password
isActive
role

if password changed user will be logged out
if isActive is set to false user will be logged out and disabled

item.name: add devices and types to lists
